trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Kirkwood
There were no other sightings in Kirkwood on or around April 11th 2011
Summary: Purple oval object with purple contrail slowly moved across the sky, stopped and changed direction leaving very fast.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis was called in to Mufon and was given to Debbie Ziegelmeyer Mo. S.D. The witness was looking out the window and saw the object move slowly across the sky, stop, reverse direction and move away very very fast. It was oval shape, purple, and leaving a purple contrail when it traveled in both directions. It was viewed to the east, moving to the west and leaving to the east. The entire sighting lasted 15-20 seconds and he lost sight of the object when it moved behind trees.
